thread.title: BTS flies to Manila for 2-day show
thread.title_full: BTS flies to Manila for 2-day show

author: jbalboa
title: BTS flies to Manila for 2-day show
text:
By: Nathalie Esteban - @inquirerdotnet INQUIRER.net / 02:59 PM February 15, 2017 
ARMYs are in for a treat, as the boys of Bangtan Sonyeondan (BTS) will be coming back to Manila for a two-day concert on May 6 and 7, at the Mall of Asia Arena. 
BTS’ agency, Big Hit Entertainment, announced on Twitter the first set of show dates, along with the countries that the boys will be visiting for their “The Wings Tour: 2017 BTS Live Trilogy Episode III”. ADVERTISEMENT 
— BigHit Entertainment (@BigHitEnt) February 15, 2017 
Rumors of BTS coming back to Manila have been going around since K-pop fairy godmother, Happee Sy, started dropping hints. 
BTS’ concert in Manila last year, “2016 BTS LIVE Hwa Yang Yeon Hwa on stage: Epilogue”, was a sold-out show, with tickets gone on the first day of official selling. 
Practice your fanchants and get ready to fly with BTS by watching their shows on Viu , for free, forever! JB
